Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill enables users to control all their Lights, Fans, Water Heaters, Motors, Wall Sockets, and many more using voice commands through Alexa.

All the devices you wish to control need to be connected to G-Smart Home, through our varied product range which includes:

a. Grand 2S -> Control up to 2 devices, including 1 high-wattage device such as Water Heater or AC.
b. Grand 3S-> Control up to 3 devices, including 1 high-wattage device such as Water Heater or AC.
c. Grand 4S-> Control up to 4 devices, including 1 high-wattage device such as Water Heater or AC.
d. Grand 6S-> Control up to 6 devices, including 1 high-wattage device such as Water Heater or AC.
e. Grand 8S-> Control up to 8 devices, including 1 high-wattage device such as Water Heater or AC.
f. Grand 4S1F-> Control up to 5 devices, including 1 Fan and, 1 high-wattage device such as Water Heaters or AC.
g. Grand 6S1F-> Control up to 7 devices, including 1 Fan and, 1 high-wattage device such as Water Heaters or AC.
h. Grand 10S-> Control up to 10 devices, including 1 high-wattage device such as Water Heater or AC.

Download the 'G-Smart' app from Google Play Store and G-Smart Home from App Store and sign up to connect these devices. Once registered, you will get an email about account details, use the same account to sign in during the account linking process from the Amazon Alexa app. If you have more than one house linked with this account, access to every device in all the houses will be shared with Alexa.

What does this skill do? 
a. Turn ON/OFF any of the connected devices. 
b. Regulate the speed of Fans 
c. Activate Scenes that were set up using G-Smart or G-Smart Home mobile app.
